title: Powell Peralta/Bones Brigade font?
content:
I’ve searched high and low, but I was hoping the experts could help.

Has anyone come across a replica of the old Bones Brigade/Powell Peralta hand written font like the one in the attached picture? I’d appreciate it if someone could point me to one! Thanks.

-loren

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ratbones2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212214/http:/typophile.com/files/ratbones2.jpg) | 26.12 KB |

 [‹ Take it to the next level](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45206 "Go to previous forum topic") [can anyone id this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45198 "Go to next forum topic")
author: skivvie

comments.content:
As you said it was hand-written. There are similar fonts you can find by searching for ’graffiti’.

- Mike Yanega
